availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Madison B. Luckett (Henry County, Kentucky, carpenter)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, carpenter. Henry County native. Son of Lawson Luckett and Hulda Bartlett Luckett. Married to Martha S. Luckett. Father of Lorena Luckett. Farmer in Henry County in 1850. Employed by Monarch Murphey as a carpenter in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 435B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 244.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, New Castle, p. 326B.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll # 7017485, All Counties, p. 833.
